content.detailedDescription:
On october 2nd 2014, between 2:33 and 2:35 pm,  i was driving north on the 101 freeway about to get on the 405 south, nearest exit is sepulveda. in the sky to my left, i saw 3 orbs in the sky.  they looked like fireballs or flares from a flare gun except bigger. there was a big one in the middle, a smaller one on the right, and an even smaller one on the left with a little "crumb" to it's left. they were in the sky above the city, to the left of my vantage point. the sky was clear. i had my glasses on. there was nothing obstructing my view of them. 
at first i thought it was a flare gun or some sort of fireworks/pyrotechnics but they weren't moving. just sitting perfectly still in the sky, above some palm trees, about one and a half times as high in air as the palm trees. there was what looked like a southwest airlines plane flying in the sky as well, several hundred yards behind the orbs so i thought there might be a connection there but i don't know. (i am not positive it was a southwest airlines plane. but it was definitely a passenger plane. that i am sure of) i was able to get a good, clear look at the orbs for about 10 to 15 seconds. they were staying perfectly still. i had to look away for a moment to get on the ramp to the 405 south. then i kept looking. once i realized they weren't flares, i said "holy ****" out loud, and in that moment, they vanished. there was no smoke or dissipation. they just disappeared. like a tv screen turning off.

i am not jumping to conclusions that these were aliens or some sort of super natural phenomenon. even though i'd never seen this before, something about it struck me as being perfectly ordinary. i wonder if it could be some sort of reflection from the ground or the airplane in the back, or st. elmo's fire on land. just because i haven't seen it before doesn't mean it's supernatural. i looked later that day for other reports. it was near the freeway and there were many cars on the road  so i can't be the only one who saw it. but my search didn't yield any results. 

fyi -i was not able to take any pictures, as i was driving at the time. the picture that i have attached to this report is a screen grab from a youtube video. it is attached only as a reference to what i saw, since what i saw is almost exactly the same as what's in the picture. i just want to reiterate, i did not take the attached picture or any picture of what i saw. the only difference between the picture and what i saw is that the orbs i saw seemed to be a little further away from each other than they appear in this picture. but they were still very close to each other. if you have any questions or concerns feel free to contact me.
content.summary: 3 orbs in the sky. they looked like fireballs. a large one in the middle, a smaller one to the right, and an even smaller one to the left with a small 'crumb' to it's left. luminescent. amorphous.

content.detailedDescription:
Looking out the large windows at my place of employment. near the rose quarter. windows face ne.
at 11 am i saw what initially looked like a flock of birds but the proportions of the individual objects didn't appear to be birds after looking for another second or two. my boss was standing in front of me, talking to me, so i was trying to give my attention to her and to the objects.
there were about 20-30, bright white, slightly silver, extremely reflective objects. about 300 feet from me, moving in my direction slowly, moving in a not-straight line. they were moving too uniformly compared to every other bird sighting i have seen. after about 5 seconds they flew out of range of the window. my boss was still talking to me so i couldn't run outside, but i knew i had seen something strange.
at about 12:20, i happened to glance out the window again. something reflective caught my eye, and after focusing in on it, i could tell it was the same objects i saw earlier. they were further away than before, maybe 6-800 feet (the opposite direction they were moving earlier), and were going in and out of transparency. they were in a tighter, more uniform formation, nearly spherical, but still seemed to float slowly this way and that, without a clear direction. i reached for my phone while keeping my eyes on them. they must've gone in and out of transparency 4 or 5 times in the 15-20 seconds i kept my eyes on them. i ran outside to get a shot and they were gone. this has left me very uneasy.
after doing a little research, the closest comparison i can find is the youtube videos that show ufo 'fleets'. it is almost exactly like those except i only saw about 20-30 orbs and they definitely went in and out of transparency.
content.summary: 20-30 highly relective white/silver orbs, hovering in unison, going from solid state to complete transparency

content.detailedDescription: I was out on my deck, it was clear and quite night, i was starring up in the sky when movement caught my eye in the south, i saw an object moving very fast with several white circles barley visible, at first i thought it was birds until it got directly above me, i could see the white circles that were barely visible and perfectly symmetrical, also i could see the edges of the object, the object was camouflaged or transparent as it took on the color of the back ground it was against. it flew to the north and disappeared. it was moving at a very high rate of speed, about the same speed as a jet that does a fly over at a stadium. the object made no sound at all.
content.summary: Witnessed a diamond shaped object moving very fast with white circles at the bottom of the air craft

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my kids to school. my oldest son said what is that in the sky. we looked up and saw a slender diamond shape object that was sparkling goingreally fast downward then it stopped and it to the right and floated for a few minutes then it went up and it was gone.
content.summary: It was a slender diamond shaped that sparkled

content.detailedDescription:
Approximately on october 2nd or 3rd i was in the garden and i saw a small passenger aircraft in the sky (not sure of height or distance away from me).
the plane was moving and i saw a cloudy cigar or disc shaped (if viewed sideways on)  object cruising alongside the air craft. it looked to me to be about 5-6 times the size of the passenger aircraft.At first i thought it was a normal cloud formation. the object looked as if it was using cloud as camouflage and it was darker in shade than the clouds themselves and it kept pace with the aircraft in question. i observed it for a minute or so, till the plane was out of my sight.
content.summary: Cigar shaped object at side of passenger aircraft

content.detailedDescription:
September 28th 2014. my father and i were on our way to cape breton,  in nova scotia, canada driving the highway between antigonish and the canso causeway.  it was approximately 7:15am with not a cloud in the sky.  i observed what at first looked like a airplane about 10 degrees above the horizon.  i could not see a plane however there were what looked to be engine exhaust in a small (v) shape in the sky.  at first it looked like a distant plane flying toward us or south bound.  after a minute or 2 of watching it stay stationary in the sky i soon realized it was not a plane.  i grabbed the binoculars from the back seat of the truck and proceeded to look at it.  i looked for about 10 seconds through the binoculars when all of the sudden with in 5 seconds it faded away to absolutely nothing (no trace).  i never did see anything that looked like a plane only what looked to be short exhaust trails from a plane.  after it quickly disappeared we were stunned and continue to look for it in the sky.  about 20 seconds after it disappeared from sight, what looked to be a star suddenly appeared very close to where it had originally disappeared the star like light zipped across the sky from the north to the south east and only lasted about 10 seconds until it once again faded from sight.  

i thought the star like thing that we saw may have been a satellite zipping across the morning sky but this would not explain the stationary (v) shaped exhaust trail we observed a minute earlier that quickly disappeared within 5 seconds.

has there been any other reports like this one from this area?
content.summary: Thought is was a plane exhaust until it disapeared with 5 seconds
content.locationName: Above cape breton island, Nova Scotia

content.detailedDescription: I was in our garden having a drink of coffee, it was a clear night not many stars visible to the eye.I looked up at the viewable constellations (not many constellations visible due to location and street lights) and noticed a couple of stars which were not very bright, the stars appeared in a diagonal line in the sky fairly close together and the lower star was stationary then it shot off at great speed (ie: faster than any known air craft) and then it was gone.
content.summary: Distant star hovering then moving off at speed

content.detailedDescription: on approximately march 10th 2010 (unsure of actual time and date). me and my brother were standing on our drive way having a cigarette. when we noticed what at first we thought was a balloon. we observed a spherical object, it was stationary.Which in itself was strange as it was quite windy that day. it had a bright silver/grey appearance, it looked  the size of a basketball, it must have been larger in diameter than it looked to us due to the distance from us. it made no sound what so ever. me and my brother both looked at each other and looked back at the roof line where we both saw this object was and it had vanished without trace. to this day we have absolutely no idea what it was that we saw.
content.summary: Silver sphere hovering over roof tops near our house

content.detailedDescription:
O october 2, 2014 i had woken up at about 4:10 am.  i went to the bathroom to clean up and get ready for the day.  i did my business, and as i was wiping my face, i turned towards the east facing wall with a glass block window.  i observed an extremely bright reddish orange 'ball', that would have been positioned above my neighbors trees in his back yard.  it was distorted as i was looking thru glass block, but i was trying to reconcile the size and placement of the sphere, with it possibly being the moon?  but i knew it was not the proper time or place to be seeing the moon.  i stood and looked at it for a couple of seconds, it hovered up and down slightly.  at that point i decided to go to my kitchen, which is adjacent to the bathroom, and go to look out the window to see better what was going on.  it was 4:17 am. i started to open the blinds, and as i got them opened, you could see the sphere that was above the tree tops, shoot straight up and disappear.  it made no sound or leave any sign it was there.  i went outside to my front porch to see if i could see anything further up in the sky, but didn't see anything at all.  it really startled me!

i thought about calling the sheriff's department, but thought they would think i was crazy.  i waited around to see if anyone came outside after i saw this, maybe they too saw this object.  no one came out, no police came by nothing.
content.summary: Orange sphere hovering above tree tops, then going straight up

content.detailedDescription:
Sunday (10-5-14) afternoon i had my dogs out in the desert chasing rabbits.  since the skies were crystal-clear i thought i'd lay my video camera on the roof of my jeep and record looking straight up into the sky.  i let the camera run for nearly 3 minutes.  saw nothing at the time.  as soon as i uploaded the film to my computer i spotted these white things flying around above me.  
the object in view most of the video jerks around quite abruptly and makes 180° turns moving very quickly.  it is also ejecting something white as it moves around (alien chem-trail?).  several other objects interact with this main character and one near the end is much brighter and flies by in the lower right corner of the frame.
this happened out in the gunnison gorge nca in the desert between smith mountain and peach valley road, off of h75 road.  there were no other people within several miles, but there were a couple biting flies buzzing me down at ground level.  
the video is 2.36 minutes in length.  at several points the main object looks to be triangular in shape, but also star-like.  i have no clue as to how high-up these things were, since there are no reference points in a clear sky!
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Triangular white orbs flying around above me out in desert.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were outside talking to a friend and i just happened to look up at the stars because i love looking at the stars. but when i looked just south of willard peak there was a light that sat there in the sky. i just didnt know what to make of it i really thought it was a plane. after my husbands friend left i asked my husband to look at it and he looked right at what i was trying to figure out but he too could not figure out what it was we were both a little confused on what it could be but it changed colors and moved not a whole lot but i still dont know what i saw. i didnt ever lose sight of it but we had to out our kids to bed and then we went back out but it got cold and bugs were bad so we went into the house. i just wish i knew what i saw
content.summary: Weird light in sky and i couldnt explain it

content.detailedDescription: Me and my cousin was coming from the 7-11 on jeff davies hwy in woodbridge va. we saw a very bright orb light hovering over cardinal dr right behind the police station as we walked up the road on cardinal dr. it was just hovering there with no sound at all. by this time we was just walking and looking at it and then it seem like it was following us so we ran all the way home .At this time the object was very high in the sky but seem to be still following us. we got to the house all the neibhors were already outside looking at this thing hovering over cardinal dr then after a moment it moved east in the woods and seem to land in the woods and then pulsing light beamed out the woods red green blue and white moving in a circle around and around for about 15 or 20 minutes then it hovered up and back over cardinal dr and sat there for a minute with no sound at all then it came really close and then shot up the air and disappeared for a little while and reappeared further up cardinal dr over the bridge and it started to move over i95 north moving side to side and moving and stopping on the dime no sound by the a police officer from prince william county was trying to get everyone in the house and said it was a blimp and it did some crazy move up and down and side to side with no sound at all and we told the officer that's not a blimp by then it was over us andit just shot up in the air and it was gone. for years i use to tell this story to son and the one day i saw the same orb over the dome of the rock in isael on utube and i mean the same exact orb
content.summary: The same entity that was over the dome of the rock in isreal

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my living room watching tv. i kept seeing pulsating lights out of the corner of my eye. i opened the sliding glass door and saw three blue star-like orbs and immediately thought they were ufos. they didn't move at all. i started feeling very hot, sweating profusely, sick and very scared. the objects are still outside pulsating light as i type this.
content.summary: Flashing lights in sky, no sound, coming from three or four objects

content.detailedDescription: My brother "rich" and i, go out every evening and sit on the front porch for awhile, and visit and look and the stars, before we head to bed. it was around 8:15 in the late evening, dark with a bright moon and a totally clear sky. with in a few seconds after i sat down, i immediately noticed a very bright and apparently large light (or object) coming from the south west and heading north east, in a straight line. my brother seen it at the same time, when i alerted him to the sighting. i went inside my front door, and picked up a 10x50 binocular and continued watching the object. we both observed it through the binocular, and there was no blinking lights what so ever, just one huge bright light! it reminded me of the space station that i had observed on 3 different occasions. you couldn't see many stars, because the moon was so bright, and this was the brightest light observed in our whole field of vision which was quite large. even on a dark night with a lot of stars, this would have been as bright or  brighter than what i remember the space station being. we thought it must be a large satellite, and maybe in fact, even the space station. it was moving fast through the sky similar to what we would expect a satellite to do, but it was so big, we thought it must be fairly close to the earth, and of course between the earth and the moon. to our surprise, as we watched, it was heading straight toward the moon! so i got ahead of it with my binocular, and focused on the moon, so i could hopefully see a silhouette of it, or at least just see it pass in front of the moon. as we watched, the object was approaching the upper part of the moon, but when it got to the moon, it didn't go in front of it where i could see it, it went behind the moon and as we waited the second or two it would have taken to come out on the other side, it surprisingly didn't! my brother said just as it got to the moon, it appeared to him to have arced slightly and then it disappeared behind the moon. we watched for the next half an hour, and nothing was observed coming from behind the moon. there were many high altitude plane flights, going through the skies, during our observation period, and all of them were much, much smaller and not even close to the brightness of the object we were watching. also, all the planes had the blinking lights you always see on air craft. it was obvious to us, that if this object was indeed at the same distance from earth, as the moon, then it had to be a very, very  large object. this sighting cemented my belief in other intelligent life in our universe and that there is absolutely something going on, on the moon! i'm glad i witnessed this with my brother, so i would have back up to our sighting. we weren't drinking, or doing any kind of drugs, and we were totally sober (i don't drink or do drugs)and fully alert. i am 65 years old, and my brother is 46. this was quite an eye opener to both of us!  there surely had to be other people that observed this also. thanks....
content.summary: Large bright light, on a clear night with a bright full moon, was going across the sky and straight to the moon, and obviously went

content.detailedDescription:
On october 2nd 2014 in the ouray, utah area, from noon until sundown i observed three large, bright silvery objects hovering in the sky above me.
one appeared to be cone shaped with the other two cylinder shaped.
a large number of people observed them, even as far as 30 miles away from where i was.
it's the second time in three weeks i have seen them in the area.
my wife called me from roosevelt, utah and asked me if i could see the objects, thats why i noticed them.
content.summary: From about noon on october 2nd 2014 until sundown i observed three conelike or cylinder shaped objects hovering almost directly overhead in the ouray, utah area while i was working.

content.detailedDescription: Out star gazing as we always do. saw a plane or two go by then off to our right in the sky two bright orange fuzzy circular fireballs came drifting by in a straight line,one below the other.The second one trailing a little below first one.Slowly moved towards southeast,these objects had no sound what so ever at all.Was not a plane,nor a bird,nor a hot air balloon, nor a helicopter,nor a star.Eventually the color dimmed and slowly faded away completely.Very jaw dropping and shocking.
content.summary: In frontyard star gazing,bright orange lights,helicopters,two orange round fuzzy objects moving slowly across sky,jaw dropping,objects slowly dimmed and vanished.

content.detailedDescription: Traveling on hwy 111 from chattanooga to dunlap. shortly after crossing the sequatchie county line, a reflective object was noticed to my left. the craft was hovering over trees about a mile or less away. it was eggshaped and was stationary. i have seen this object before, but closer and in a different, but similar location.
content.summary: Reflective craft hovering over trees in the distance. seen once before along same road, different location.

content.detailedDescription:
Night sky video recording with looking south viewing large area including 2 bright stationary satellites using kt&c high performance cctv camera model kpc-ej230nuwx with optional 25mm lens. very large inverted "u" light appeared at top of frame partially obstructed by day/date/time recorded at top center. the light filled in to become an elongated oval slightly brighter at the top trailing end. the object appeared in 17 frames of recording at 24 frames per second. about 1/3 of the way along its path a faint vapor/debris trail began as if the ufo was desending into more dense atmosphere. it disappeared partiall behind a cross hair line i had created in the camera software and into clouds that were present only in the bottom of the frame. 
i have been recording this portion of sky 24/7 for a couple weeks and play back at high speed when i have time. i was very lucky to catch a glimpse of it but it appeared so much larger than ever low flying aircraft that i backed up and found it at slower play speed. 
i should be able to copy the video off the cctv dvr but haven't figured out how to yet. generally it is safe on the dvr for up to 2 weeks before it gets over written. 
i am submitting one frame snapshot taken of my tv monitor with my cellphone camera.

at 70+ my experience tells me this ain't saturn mars or jupiter ;-)
content.summary: Very large object night video recording 17 frames of 24 f/s video. partial vapor/debri trail.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my swimming pool and noticed an object high in the sky above me. i am an aviation nut and notice most things in the sky. i'm always looking up. i didn't know what the object was when i first saw it. once i saw it. i got dried off and went inside as quickly as i could to get me nikon  camera with 300mm zoom lense. i started snapping photos and took a short video as well. i knew that it was not an airplane, helicopter, blimp, or hot air balloon. sky was clear except for some high cumulostratus clouds. this object was below these clouds. i estimate them being at 30 to 40 thousand feet. winds aloft were at 290 degree at 50 knots at the time of viewing. this object did not move ese as the cloud did. it pretty much hovered and might have moved slightly north from the south. the object was viewed near sunset and i viewed it until i could no longer see it. i breifly looked a way and could not find it again. it got fainter and fainter the darker it got. that lead me to believe that is was ascending. my wife, sister, brother-in-law all, father-in-law, and mother all saw it. my brother-in-law and i kept going back and forth about it being a weather balloon. i decided it couldn't be one because it was not moving with the clouds. i'm a private pilot and researched winds aloft after taking photos and my brother-in-law's weather balloon therory didn't add up to me. i thought is could have possibly been a planet. venus would have been the only thing that i thought it could have been. i pulled out google sky map on my phone and venus was setting to west with the sun. no other planets near this object. in my video i can see the object under clouds. the images im submitting have been cropped and are from my nikon d5100 with 300mm zoom.
content.summary: Hovering ufo over mesquite.

content.detailedDescription: On our way home from picking up our son going north on everett turnpike in nashua nh we saw in a distance what looked like an unusually bright star, but as we got closer a mile or more up the road i saw the bright white lights along with everyone else in the car. there were no other identifying colored lights like our aircraft is required to have. we all tried keeping our eyes on the object asking each other what the hell is that?! as we were nearing our exit we could see it right over us through the moonroof heading west at slow but silent speed, and out of view over trees and buildings. i always believed in extraterrestrials, but after tonight i will be looking up at the sky more often for stars that look a little too big or awkward. i found this extremely exciting, hope to see more!
content.summary: Boomarang shaped ufo, 3 white bright lights with 2 smaller yellowish lights on bottom.

content.detailedDescription: I noticed what i thought to be a plane while sitting on my upstairs side porch. i  have a view of the mississippiriver brigde and lots of open airspace. i assumed that the shiny whitish object that was moving high in the sky-a good distance away was a plane. it was moving westward in a straight parallel line to the ground. it seemed small because  it was pretty far away. the sun was setting and made the object stand out as reflective. as i watched it moving in a straight line westward, it suddenly changed direction. it moved back (still on same line and height) toward the east and the bridge. that's what caught my attention to film it for good measure. by the time i started filming, it was moving in the eastward line. i watched  it as far as i could see from my porch and then it was out of my line of sight. the video is somewhat unremarkable. it the imaged zoomed and enhanced convinced me that it was not a plane.
content.summary: Only took notice bc it changed  direction. otherwise i'd assumed it was a plane.

content.detailedDescription:
I was heading down bear creek parkway in keller towards whitley road.  i was approaching the stop sign and noticed a camo colored (grey and black) tear shape thing in the sky, but the tail was on the bottom of the item and not in the middle. it was getting ready to become twilight at this hour (sky was dark blue in the background).  i looked and my first thought was that was a strange looking helicopter, where are the lights on it. i noticed two planes in the sky to the left of the item, and i saw the white lights on both plane and one had red lights on it. then i looked at the object again, and made note no lights, no windows, no propellers, it was smooth no breaks in the outline to indicate any propellers, this is when i made a mental note that it was black and grey camouflage.  i looked to turn to the left at the stop sign, and i looked back in the sky and it was gone. 

it just hanged out in the sky without moving. it did not look like it was tied to anything. from the stop sign i would say from my point of view it was at least 5 inches long, and could tell it was out a distance.
content.summary: A round ball with a tall on the bottom of it.

content.detailedDescription: I have a video footage of an ovni shining lights at southeastern brazilian shore last saturday october 4 2014. the objects were noticed as the sun went down and its lights became strong. it was completely unmoved since we found it flying in the sky. the distance were too long and the light were so sharp so it might does not refer to a ballon, helicopter or anything we already know.
content.summary: Ovni in southeastern brazilian shore 4 oct 2014
content.locationName: Boissucanga , São Sebasti, State of São Paulo

content.detailedDescription:
After exiting out our hotel room, we walked to the common area of the hotel. we found the darkest part of the common area to relax for the evening. it was a very clear night and the moon seemed very bright. we were facing south on two lawn chairs observing the clear night sky. the moon was about @35 to 50 degree above the horizon to the south. after observing a couple of planes moving from the sw to ne pattern @ 30 degrees to our right. after about 10 mins of watching the skies. i lifted my hand up and blocked the light from the moon. after doing this, i noticed a small star above the moon. i watched it for about a 1 min and noticed, it was blinking. thinking it was a satellite i continued to watch it. and then it moved it moved up then in a arc to the left then moving upwards then to the right. it never repeated the pattern then it would stop. after it cycled about 2 times. i told my girlfriend sitting next to me to. block the light of the moon out and try to find the same object i was looking it. it took her less then 10 sec to locate it. and i waited for her to see the object move. it did without fail. so she confirmed everything i had observed without me telling her what i saw. at the point, i ran back to the room and grabbed her nikon d3100 dslr and tripod and my gopro 3+ black. after returning i turned the gopro on and faced it up and let it record. then setup the nikon to take night shots with different iso setting. the object continues the move in random left,right up down but never moving very far from its resting point. after another 15 mins of watching and recording. we stop and head back to the hotel room. once at the hotel room i get my samsung gs5 and open up the google sky map app to get idea of what this could be or what it is. google sky map no help, i open up the iss locator app to see if this is the iss, nope next iss pass was for 21 hrs. alright last hope of trying figures this thing out. i open up the satellite ar app and select all satellites. no hope again. but this did allow me to track its position in space. 

object was located when facing south. between navstar58 and geotail sats. 
between star m15 and m2 and to give a little better or closer the bent leg of the pegasus constellation to the right of enif. 

in short we witnessed an object moving randomly for a period of about 2 hrs in the night sky. i am still reviewing and willing to hand over all videos and pictures, i just haven't gone though it.
content.summary: Small object, masked by bright moon 2 people witnessed object.

content.detailedDescription: Went out on deck of rental house at 12:15am which overlooks the ocean in n. myrtle beach, sc.  saw a large diffuse circle of light with a more defined center which was about 1/2 the diameter in width.  i have never seen anything like this.  it was a clear night with moonlight.  no clouds.  object was about 15 degrees above the horizon.  went in house to get binoculars and then saw more individual lights as in a ring around the bottom of the object.  went back in house to get hd digital video camera.  object had moved higher in the sky and wasn't as large to see.  videoed the object for 47 sec. with close up shots.  i was excited and amazed as i had never seen anything like this before. stopped videoing to observe again with naked eye at which time it receded from view and disappeared over the horizon.
content.summary: Observed ufo over ocean which disappeared over the horizon.  have video

content.detailedDescription: I heard the sound of a fighter jet outside. that in itself is not unusual considering where i live colorado springs. but, i could tell from the sound it didn't just sound like routine flying. after about ten minutes of still hearing the sound seemingly going back and forth i decided to walk out on the balcony and maybe try to snap a picture of it as i often do. could still hear it but couldn't locate it visually except one time i saw it briefly sse of where i was. took my eyes off and lost it. then as i was still searching the skies for it i saw this stationary white orb in the air ese of me. it was stationary, not moving a bit. i observed it for a minute or so and wasn't too excited because i have mistaken balloons for ufos before. but from those other observations, i had some experience as to how balloons behave ( mainly being carried around and adrift by the wind and eventually going out of sight)but this was perfectly stationary and very visible. i started taking pictures of it and at the same time i could still hear the jet fighter but couldn't see it. then as i was still photographing the object, i noticed another about an index finger to pinkie finger width just south of it and seemingly at the same altitude as it was equally as visible. again, still never moving just fixed in one position. i took pics of both, but could not get them both in the same shot. i never saw the jet and them together at any time but i had the distinct feeling that they were why i had heard the fighter in the first place. i went back in the apartment to get my binos ( 20x80)to try to get a better look. i could see it closer, but couldn't make out anything distinguishing. only about what i could see in the pictures that i took. just a white looking orb. because i could not see any detail or anything more interesting, i just went back in the apartment to try and see if i had gotten them both in one of the shots. i hadn't. so at that point, i was disappointed and just started doing something else. i could kick myself, but about twenty minutes or so later i said let me go see if they are still there. they were not, and i do not know where they went or how they left. but, i do have some pics as evidence that i saw them. i included photo 244 to show that i tried a wider angle shot to try to get both orbs in the same shot but i got nothing. i don't know why except that i must have been pointing the camera in the wrong area. these were taken with a fuji hs30 camera with a 30x zoom lens at different focal lengths. there was also a chemtrail plane visible at the time i was taking the pics. you can see part of the trail in the left side of photo 244. it came from the east and went sw sort of. at this same time, i could still hear the fighter somewhere but couldn't see it.The sky was pale blue with light wispy clouds ( chemtrails ) and not very contrasty. it was hard to get good lock-on focus. these were definitely not balloons, and they were definitely not moving. in the pics, you may be looking at two different orbs. they looked exactly alike and i would take a picture of one and then of the other and on the pics i can't tell which is which. that's why i tried and failed to get them both in the same shot.
content.summary: Heard fighter aircraft engine. went outside to photograph fighter. looked se and saw to disks hovering

content.detailedDescription: I was working an event when my boss asked me to take his friends back to the frederick airport. after i dropped them off at airport i headed back the same way i had taken and i always lookin the fields for deer when i noticed all kinds of bright orange lights like stars moving up and down and side to side i stopped the vehicle immediatly in the road and was amazed watching them until traffic came up from behind me so i pointed out my window towards the lights to show people behind me then started to head back to work. when i got back i asked the boss to leave so i could see if the lights wher still there wich was about ten minutes later the lights was gone i pulled over twice on the same road for only a minute at each stopjust to see if they would reapear wich they did not so i went home.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright orange starlike lights moving around fading in and out reappearing

content.detailedDescription:
Q1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
a1. camping in "packer gulch" area near tarryall reservoir - lat 39° 10.868'n lon 105° 36.513'w (approximate). 

q2. what made you first notice the object?
a2. sitting around camp fire looking up at the beautiful clear blue sky.

q3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
a3. i thought maybe it was a cloud, balloon, or possibly drone with hover capability.   

q4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.
a4. observed three sphere-shaped white objects of the same size, shape and color that were evenly spaced in a straight line aligned north-east to south-west.  the three spheres were stationary and appeared to not be moving at all for 30-min to 1hr.  over a period of several hours all three objects moved together very, very slowly in a south-west direction until they disappeared from sight.  the pattern of movement, albeit very slow, was such that the three objects moved in unison in a line formation keeping an equal distance from one another - this characteristic was the most difficult to explain.         

q5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
a5. confusion, amazement and fear.  we continued to discuss the event through the night and the days to follow.    

q6. how did you lose sight of the object?
a6. they slowly moved out of sight.  

summary of event: sitting around camp i noticed one white spherically-shaped object almost directly overhead.  i did not say anything for several minutes as i was trying to make sense out of what i was seeing but could not.  thinking to myself about possible explanations i was able to rule out the following: cloud, balloon, plane, drone and celestial bodies (planets / moon / star).  at that time i pointed out the object to my wife and asked what do you think that is?  she had trouble spotting the object at first then was puzzled as was i once she saw it.  we then both stood up and starting looking more closely at the sky and minutes later i spotted a second object that was exactly the same size, shape and color as the first object observed.  we then started to look at the two objects with binoculars and were amazed at what we were seeing - the objects were perfectly round white spheres that appears to be made of soft white light and gave off a dull glow.  they did not appear metallic or disc shaped and were perfectly still and motionless.  after several more minutes my wife then noticed that there was a third object exactly the same size, shape and color as the first and second objects observed.  at this time we realized the three objects were aligned in a north-east to south-west straight line formation all at the same altitude and equal distance apart from one another.  we began to take video and photo documentation of the event and were also at that time a bit on edge and fearful of what we had seen.  over the next several hours all three objects moved together very, very slowly in a south-west direction maintaining the same altitude until they disappeared from sight.  the pattern of movement, albeit very slow, was such that the three objects moved in unison in a straight line formation keeping an equal distance from one another - this characteristic of their movement and the fact that there was three objects, was the most difficult to explain.
content.summary: Observed three sphere-shaped white objects of the same size, shape and color that were evenly spaced in a straight line aligned north-east to south-west.

content.detailedDescription: When my school bus was about to leave the school my friend rohan told me to look out side in the sky. i saw an object shinning in the sky just like a star and then it just disappeared. just after two to three seconds i saw it again slightly away from the place where i saw it before and again i saw it third time far away from that place. i am sure it wasn't a plane. i think it was an u.F.O. if you observe a flying aero plane in the sky it moves at a low speed but that object randomly changed its position with a flash. a metal can only reflect light.
content.summary: Me and my friend saw a flashing light in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i went to a family gathering on phoenix, cave creek rd and the 101. i was in the house when i saw a crew people looking at the sky and pointing so i went out to see myself. what i saw was two star like objects, one stationary and another moving in a easterly direction. i took a picture of the moving object with my cell phone. the objects were well above the clouds. the hostess of the gathering had a high end camera and she took serial pictures of the stationary object. we saw the stationary object for about a hour and a half. i can not attach  the pictures onto the report.
content.summary: Lights in daytime sky
